import _objectSpread from"/Users/zhangyanjun/react-project/mail/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";// import { IMailData } from '@/App'
import clent from'@/client';export var getCustomers=function getCustomers(key){return clent.get("/customer/customers?key=".concat(key));};export function getChatList(id){return clent.get("/chat/chat/".concat(id));}export function getChatLlm(question,prompt){return clent.get("/llm/llm/".concat(prompt,"/").concat(question,"}"));}export function refreshAdvice(customerid,promptid){return clent.get("/llm/manual/refresh/".concat(customerid,"/").concat(promptid));}export function sendMessage(chat){return clent.post("/chat/message",_objectSpread({},chat));}export function config(){return clent.get("/config");}export function setConfig(config){return clent.post("/config",{auto_resp:config});}export function getPermissionList(id){return clent.post("/ommc/upm/permission/roleList",{tenantId:id});}export function getInfo(id){return clent.get("/customer/customer/".concat(id));}export function updateUserInfo(data){return clent.put("/customer/customer",_objectSpread({},data));}export function getBuilding(){return clent.get("/building");}// 查户型信息
export function getHouseUnit(buildingcode,unitcode){return clent.get("/building/house/apartment/structure/uiur5e3wbxak5z8g/".concat(buildingcode,"/").concat(unitcode));}//查房子信息
export function getHouse(buildingcode,unitcode){return clent.get("/building/house/simplifyinfo/uiur5e3wbxak5z8g/".concat(buildingcode,"/").concat(unitcode));}// 按日期获取日程信息
export function getSchedule(customerid,date){return clent.get("/schedule/".concat(customerid,"/date?day=").concat(date.day,"&month=").concat(date.month,"&year=").concat(date.year));}//新增日程信息
export function postScheduleInfo(data){return clent.post("/schedule",_objectSpread({},data));}export function manualGetSuggestion(data){return clent.post("/llm/manual/suggestion",_objectSpread({},data));}export function getScheduleById(id){return clent.get("/schedule/id/".concat(id));}export function getBuildInfo(id){return clent.get("/building/house/id/".concat(id));}
